Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject.Engine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Engine
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Game Engine, handle the logic execution of the game.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Engine

        public Engine()

    • Method Detail

      • fillMapWithSquare

        public void fillMapWithSquare()
        Initialize/fill up the 2 dimensional array map with Square objects. Assign the row and column attributes for each Square.

      • setUpMap

        public void setUpMap()
        Set up the map with 3 different types of powerup, 1 spy, 6 ninjas, and 9 rooms.

      • assignRooms

        public void assignRooms()
        Put 9 rooms at fixed locations on the map. Choose one random room to contain the briefcase, set the briefcase field to true.

      • assignSpy

        public Spy assignSpy()
        Initially create new Spy object and put him at the corner of the map.
        Returns:
        the spy object at location [8][0]

      • assignSpyVisibility

        public void assignSpyVisibility()
        This method allows the spy to see ahead 2 squares. Remove the darkness mark "X", and switch the visibility of ninjas, powerups to true if they are nearby.

      • assignBullet

        public void assignBullet()
        Put one Bullet object at a random location on the map.

      • assignRadar

        public void assignRadar()
        Put one Radar object at a random location on the map

      • assignInvincibility

        public void assignInvincibility()
        Put one Invincibility at one location on the nap

      • assignPowerUps

        public void assignPowerUps()
        Wrapper method to assign the bullet, radar, and invincibility to the map.

      • isOccupied

        public boolean isOccupied(int row,
                          int col)
        Check the position on the map too see if it's occupied by other game object.
        Parameters:
        row - a number from 0-8
        col - a number from 0-8
        Returns:
        true if the position is occupied.

      • toggleDebugMode

        public void toggleDebugMode()
        Toggle Debug mode, if debug is currently off switch the visible field of all game objects to true.All game objects will be visible. Else switch all of them to false, except for spy and rooms.

      • getMap

        public Square[][] getMap()
        Return the game map.
        Returns:
        a 2 dimensional array of type Square.

      • getRoomWithBriefCase

        public Room getRoomWithBriefCase()
        Return the room that contains the briefcase that has gre4ka inside it.
        Returns:
        a Room object.

      • movePlayer

        public int movePlayer(int direction)
        Move the spy to the directed direction. The spy can look it room, look for the gre4ka, get stab if walk into ninja, and activate the power up if found.
        Parameters:
        direction - an integer from 1-4: 1-up, 2-left, 3-down, 4-right.
        Returns:
        the status code: 1 - the player moved sucessfully, 2 - move failed, 3 - room empty, 4 - the player got stabbed, 5 - the player activated Bullet power up, 6 - the player activated Radar power up, 7 - the player activated Invincibility power up, 8- the spy is invicible, he can not get stabbed or walk into another ninja.

      • shootNinja

        public int shootNinja(int direction)
        Perform the shooting action, kill the first ninja that stands in the bullet direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - 1-up, 2-down, 3-left, 4-right.
        Returns:
        the status code of the action: 1 - killed a ninja, 2 - missed.

      • moveNinja

        public boolean moveNinja()
        Move the all the ninjas in the game to random directions.
        Returns:
        true if all ninjas moved successfully, false if foud a spy near by and stabbed him.

      • moveSmartNinja

        public boolean moveSmartNinja()
        Hard mode: If the spy is on the ninja's line of sight, the ninja will chase the spy until the line of sight is broke. If no spy on the line of sight, the ninja will move randomly.
        Returns:
        true if all ninjas moved successfully, false if foud a spy near by and stabbed him.

      • spyInSight

        public boolean spyInSight()
        Returns:
        true if ninja has the same row or column as the spy

      • checkForSpy

        public boolean checkForSpy(Ninja ninja)
        Check the surround locations of this ninja. If there is the spy next to it, the spy got stabbed! Reset the spy to it's starting postion, minus one live.
        Parameters:
        ninja - the Ninja object.
        Returns:
        true if the spy got stabbed.

      • stabSpy

        public void stabSpy()
        Stab the spy, move back to original postion, minus on live. Clear the spy off the current position on the map.

      • gameOver

        public int gameOver()
        Check for the winning condition of the game.
        Returns:
        and integer for game end status code: 1-found the briefcase, 2-got stabbed to death.

      • getSpy

        public Spy getSpy()
        Return the spy in the current game.
        Returns:
        the Spy object.

      • getInvincibilityTurns

        public int getInvincibilityTurns()
        Return the number of the turn of the the spy's invincibility.
        Returns:
        an int from 0-5

      • getDebug

        public boolean getDebug()
        Return the status of the debug mode.
        Returns:
        true if debug mode is activated.
